title: "Your Shop" won't open for me
body: it just keeps loading and never displays anything

went to Walmart while i left my shop open to load, came back roughly 40 minutes later and its still loading

The Shop was bugged to begin with. Nobody was getting any skins for any champions they owned or played, so Rito took the shop down and reset everyone's. That's why it's still loading, because they're still trying to fix everything
